mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.SRAException
mdException.label: Super Registry Administrator Exception
mdException.message: You must be a Super Registry Adminstrator in order to perform this action.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.OrganizationRAException
mdException.label: Organization Registry Administrator Exception
mdException.message: You must be a Registry Adminstrator of the organization in order to perform this action.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.OrganizationRMException
mdException.label: Organization Registry Maintainer Exception
mdException.message: You must be a Registry Maintainer of the {organizationLabel} for {geoObjectType} in order to perform this action.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.OrganizationRCException
mdException.label: Organization Registry Contributor Exception
mdException.message: You must be a Registry Maintainer of the {organizationLabel} for {geoObjectType} in order to perform this action.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.OrganizationRCException
mdException.label: Organization Registry Contributor Exception
mdException.message: You must be a Registry Maintainer of the {organizationLabel} for {geoObjectType} in order to perform this action.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.OrganizationACException
mdException.label: Organization Registry Contributor Exception
mdException.message: You must be a Registry Maintainer of the {organizationLabel} for {geoObjectType} in order to perform this action.
